item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoMayorkas is the first Latino to serve as Homeland Security secretary. He is sure to face political battles over...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoMayorkas is the first Latino to serve as Homeland Security secretary. He is sure to face political battles over immigration and border security.

latimes.com

Alejandro Mayorkas confirmed as Homeland Security secretary over GOP opposition

Mayorkas is the first Latino to serve as Homeland Security secretary. He is sure to face political battles over immigration and border security.Mayorkas is the first Latino to serve as Homeland Security secretary. He is sure to face political battles over immigration and border security.

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her application for residency. She‚Äôs been living in the U.S. since she was a child and now has three children of her own, and obtaining her residency is crucial for her to be able to stay with her family, including her parents, siblings, and children. You can order enchiladas to support Tania and her family at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals program. She arrived to the U.S. when she was just five years old, and through DACA she‚Äôs ...been able to pursue higher education, work for Denver Public Schools as a family liaison, and have a family of her own. She‚Äôs now applying for her residency, which is an incredibly expensive process, so she‚Äôs selling enchiladas this weekend to help raise money to cover the costs. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup will be in Denver this weekend, and money can be sent via Venmo to @/tania-baez-30. Place in Denver for pick up 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 ready 1 pm

item.title: *Sigue en espa√±ol* ACTION ALERT - We share with you in anger...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

*Sigue en espa√±ol*
ACTION ALERT - We share with you in anger and sadness the unjust news that Not1More member Hilda Martinez was arrested at a Border Patrol checkpoint on Friday and is being held in jail in New Mexico right now. Hilda Martinez requests your immediate solidarity. She was visiting family in El Paso last week. These checkpoints are a part of the daily terror and oppression Border Patrol inflicts on the region. She will have her first hearing this week. Her child...ren are safe here in Colorado as they did not accompany her on this visit.
Action steps:
1. Leave a love note or prayer here for Hilda. We'll be sharing them with her when she calls.
2. Attend our livestream vigil tonight. https://fb.me/e/42WwzHSmJ Next steps will be shared and we'll hear from her or her sister.
3. Contribute to this gofundme and share in solidarity to support her legal costs and her children. gf.me/u/zhqkph
4. Sign and share her petition https://www.change.org/p/united-state-attorney-free-hilda-b‚Ä¶
#FreeHilda #KeepFamiliesTogether
*********************************************

Hilda se solicita su solidaridad inmediata. . Ella estuvo visitando con familia en el √°rea de El Paso, TX la semana pasada. Estos retenes son parte del terror y represi√≥n que se impone la Patrulla Fronteriza en las comunidades fronterizas. Tendr√° su primera audiencia esta semana. Sus hijos est√°n aqu√≠ al salvo en Colorado como no fueron con ella de paseo.
Paso de acci√≥n:
1. Deja una oraci√≥n o nota de amor por Hilda Aqu√≠. Vamos a estar compartiendo estos con ella.
2. Asiste a la vigilia virtual de esta noche https://fb.me/e/42WwzHSmJ
3. Contribuye a su gofundme por gastos legales y para el sosten de sus hijos gf.me/u/zhqkph
4 Firme y comparte su peticion. https://www.change.org/p/united-state-attorney-free-hilda-b‚Ä¶

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.

forbes.com

Regions Bank Of Alabama Turns Its Back On CoreCivic, Announces Plan To End Relationship

Today, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.Today, Alabama Governor Kay Ivey is expected to sign a major contract with private prison company CoreCivic, kicking off a $3B plan to construct three new prisons in the state. Regions Bank's announcement puts a wrench in that plan.

item.title: Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals program. She arrived to the U.S. when she was just five years old, and through DACA she‚Äôs been able to pursue higher education, work for Denver Public Schools as a family liaison, and have a family of her own. She‚Äôs now applying for her residency, which is an incredibly expensive process, so she‚Äôs selling enchiladas this weekend to help raise money to cover the costs. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup will be in Denver this weekend, and money can be sent via Venmo to @/tania-baez-30. Place in Denver for pick up 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 ready 1 pm

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra

The Biden administration has voiced intent to make comprehensive changes to immigration policies, including through a legislative proposal that would include a pathway to citizenship.

denverpost.com

‚ÄúWe can come out of this shadow‚Äù: Colorado immigrants look to Biden‚Äôs proposed policies for certainty

The Biden administration has voiced intent to make comprehensive changes to immigration policies, including through a legislative proposal that would include a pathway to citizenship.The Biden administration has voiced intent to make comprehensive changes to immigration policies, including through a legislative proposal that would include a pathway to citizenship.
